analyzed: mkhas pa rnams la tshad ma ma yin zhes pa yod pa'i sgro 'dogs rnam par bkag pa las ma gtogs pa tshad ma'i blo yis 'di dang 'di 'dra'o zhes yul du byar med pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúIt is not a valid cognition for the wise.‚Äù Except for the negation of the superimposition of existence, the mind of valid cognition cannot make an object of this or that.

original: blo gros chen po zhes pa la sogs pas de'i rang bzhin can gzhan la sbyar bar gsungs te /
analyzed: blo gros chen po zhes pa la sogs pas de'i rang bzhin can gzhan la sbyar bar gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúMahƒÅmati,‚Äù and so on, explains the application to other natures like that.

original: de'i don yang ji ltar snang zhing myong ba'i chos thams cad don dam pa'i dngos po la sogs par brtags pa'i bdag gis stong pa nyid bdag med pa'i don yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i don yang ji ltar snang zhing myong ba'i chos thams cad don dam pa'i dngos po la sogs par brtags pa'i bdag gis stong pa nyid bdag med pa'i don yin gyi /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: The meaning of selflessness is the emptiness of the self that is imputed to all phenomena that appear and are experienced, such as ultimate things.

original: snang ba tsam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: snang ba tsam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni ma yin te /

original: de ltar na snang ba dang stong pa zung du 'jug pa'i don sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis bdag med pa'i don yin zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na snang ba dang stong pa zung du 'jug pa'i don sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis bdag med pa'i don yin zhes pa ste /
translated: In that case, the meaning of selflessness is the meaning of illusion-like unity, the union of appearance and emptiness.

original: dper na rta dang ba lang gi dngos po ni phan tshun gcig gi bdag nyid gcig ma yin la /
analyzed: dper na rta dang ba lang gi dngos po ni phan tshun gcig gi bdag nyid gcig ma yin la /
translated: For example, the things of a horse and a cow are not the same nature as each other.

original: rang rang gi ngo bor grub bzhin du snang zhing myong ba'i chos dang / brtags pa'i bdag nyid kyang phan tshun gcig gi bdag nyid gcig ma yin la /
analyzed: rang rang gi ngo bor grub bzhin du snang zhing myong ba'i chos dang / brtags pa'i bdag nyid kyang phan tshun gcig gi bdag nyid gcig ma yin la /
translated: While they are established as their own entities, they appear and are experienced. Also, the imputed self is not the same nature as the phenomena that are its bases of imputation.

original: snang ba tsam po rang gi ngo bor ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: snang ba tsam po rang gi ngo bor ma grub pa yin te /
translated: The mere appearance is not established as its own entity.

original: de'i phyir snang ba tsam gyi chos can nyid dgag bya ma yin par sngar bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir snang ba tsam gyi chos can nyid dgag bya ma yin par sngar bstan to //
translated: Therefore, as was previously explained, the mere appearance is not the object of negation.

original: gal te de lta na 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las /
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las /
translated: Someone might say, If that is so, it contradicts the statement in the noble Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Stanzas:

original: gzugs gzugs kyi ngo pos stong zhes pa la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: gzugs gzugs kyi ngo pos stong zhes pa la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang /
translated: 'Form is empty of the entityness of form,' and so on, and also:

original: gzugs ni gzhig cing gzhom du rung ba'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: gzugs ni gzhig cing gzhom du rung ba'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: 'Form is characterized by being destroyed and overcome.

original: de ni mtshan nyid med par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: de ni mtshan nyid med par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: The Tathagata fully and completely realized that to be without entityness.'

original: skyon med de /
analyzed: skyon med de /
translated: There is no fault.

original: de yang gzugs sam gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du snang ba ni de 'dra ba'i ngo bo bden par brtags pas stong pa nyid du gsungs kyi /üîΩde ltar snang ba tsam gyis stong pa rang sel ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang gzugs sam gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du snang ba ni de 'dra ba'i ngo bo bden par brtags pas stong pa nyid du gsungs kyi / de ltar snang ba tsam gyis stong pa rang sel ba ni ma yin te /
translated: That also is saying that the appearance as form or the characteristics of form is empty of the entityness that is imputed to be true.

original: de ni tshad ma la sogs pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni tshad ma la sogs pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not that the mere appearance as that is self-eliminated, because that is undermined by valid knowledge and so on.

original: bdag med pa'i dngos po zhes pa ni brtags pa'i bdag gis stong pa'i dngos po ste /
analyzed: bdag med pa'i dngos po zhes pa ni brtags pa'i bdag gis stong pa'i dngos po ste /
translated: The phrase 'entity that is without a self' means an entity that is empty of the imputed self.

original: @218b snang tshod tsam du dngos por grub pa'o //
analyzed: @218b snang tshod tsam du dngos por grub pa'o //
translated: They are established as entities to the extent that they appear.

original: de bas na byis pa so so'i skye bo zhes pa la sogs pas ni snang zhing myong ba'i chos thams cad snang ba tsam gyi mtshan nyid du yod pa de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na byis pa so so'i skye bo zhes pa la sogs pas ni snang zhing myong ba'i chos thams cad snang ba tsam gyi mtshan nyid du yod pa de bas na /
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúchildish ordinary beings‚Äù and so on indicate that all phenomena that appear and are experienced exist in the mere character of appearance.

original: byis pa rnams kyis dngos po'i bdag nyid la sogs par rtog cing brtags pa nyid dgag bya'i rang bzhin du nye bar bzung nas /
analyzed: byis pa rnams kyis dngos po'i bdag nyid la sogs par rtog cing brtags pa nyid dgag bya'i rang bzhin du nye bar bzung nas /

original: de 'dra ba'i bdag med par khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i bdag med par khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: One should understand selflessness in that way.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i blo la snang ba /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i blo la snang ba /
translated: It is not that the appearance to a nonconceptual mind

original: snang ba'i bdag nyid kyis dben pa'i sgo nas bdag med par bstan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba'i bdag nyid kyis dben pa'i sgo nas bdag med par bstan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: is taught to be selfless from the perspective of being empty of the nature of appearance.

original: de bzhin du rtog pa'i gzung ba de la snang ba'i bdag nyid kyang snang tshod tsam du med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rtog pa'i gzung ba de la snang ba'i bdag nyid kyang snang tshod tsam du med pa ma yin te /
translated: Likewise, the appearance of the apprehended to thought is not nonexistent to the extent that it appears.

original: de yang sgra 'jug pa nyid phyir //
analyzed: de yang sgra 'jug pa nyid phyir //
translated: Because it is the basis of the application of terms,

original: yod ces tha snyad rten par 'dod //
analyzed: yod ces tha snyad rten par 'dod //
translated: it is asserted to be the basis of the convention ‚Äúexistent.‚Äù

original: ces gsungs pa dang / so so rang gis rig pa'i don spangs par 'os pa ma yin pa ni chos can no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang / so so rang gis rig pa'i don spangs par 'os pa ma yin pa ni chos can no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'o na de nyid dgag bya gang gis dben pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de nyid dgag bya gang gis dben pa yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, by what is that itself devoid of the object of negation?

analyzed: phyi rol gyi rtag pa dang gtso bo la sogs par byis pas brtags pa'i chos kyis dben pa'o //
translated: It is devoid of the phenomena imagined by the childish, such as external permanent entities, primal matter, and so forth.

original: de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa la sogs pa yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa la sogs pa yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Likewise, all phenomena are empty and so forth.

original: go bar zad do de bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa skabs su bab pa'i don nyid gsal bar gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: go bar zad do de bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa skabs su bab pa'i don nyid gsal bar gsungs pa'o //

original: 'di rnams kyi don kyang de kho na nyid du gcig dang tha dad pa la sogs pa las grol ba spros pa thams cad dang bral pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi don kyang de kho na nyid du gcig dang tha dad pa la sogs pa las grol ba spros pa thams cad dang bral pa'o //

analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa tsam du ni zag pa med pa'i phung po bsdus pa'i bdag nyid do //

original: gnyis yod na zhes pa ni bden pa'i dngos po gnyis yod na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis yod na zhes pa ni bden pa'i dngos po gnyis yod na zhes pa'o //

analyzed: de la dngos po thams cad ni de kho na nyid stong pa nyid du 'dra bas na /

analyzed: tha dad pa ma yin no //

analyzed: yang kun rdzob tsam du ring ba dang thung du la sogs pa phan tshun ldog pa'i ngo bor grub pa la ltos nas tha dad pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Moreover, in terms of mere convention, long and short, etc., are established as having mutually exclusive natures, and so are said to be different.

original: de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the contaminated aggregates and the TathƒÅgata should be viewed.

original: yang thar pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad na thar pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid las 'das pa yin la de las de bzhin gshegs pa log pa na /
analyzed: yang thar pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad na thar pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid las 'das pa yin la de las de bzhin gshegs pa log pa na /
translated: Moreover, if liberation and the TathƒÅgata were different, then liberation would be beyond the characteristics of contaminated form, and if the TathƒÅgata were to turn away from that,

analyzed: de 'dra ba'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o //

original: yang bdag nyid thams cad nas thar pa dang gcig na ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor @219a * //
analyzed: yang bdag nyid thams cad nas thar pa dang gcig na ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor @219a * //
translated: Moreover, if liberation and the TathƒÅgata were the same in every respect, then the TathƒÅgata would be impermanent,

original: can rnams kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i mtshan nyid bye brag med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: can rnams kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i mtshan nyid bye brag med par 'gyur ro //

original: de ltar 'dod pa yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de ltar 'dod pa yang mi 'thad de /

analyzed: rnal 'byor can rnams kyi thob pa dang spangs pa mi 'dra ba'i bye brag mthong ba'i phyir ro //

original: dmigs pa med ces pa ni shes pa thams cad kyis mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med ces pa ni shes pa thams cad kyis mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout an objective support‚Äù means that it is not the objective support of any cognition.

analyzed: tshad ma dang dbang po ni rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i spyi dang / dbang po'i mngon sum gyi yul ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout a valid cognition or a sense faculty‚Äù means that it is not the object of inference, etc., or of the sense faculties‚Äô direct perception.

original: phung por brten nas ces pa ni de rgyur byas pa'am /
analyzed: phung por brten nas ces pa ni de rgyur byas pa'am /
translated: ‚ÄúIn dependence upon the aggregates‚Äù means that it is made from them as a cause

original: blo'i mdun du byas pa'o //
analyzed: blo'i mdun du byas pa'o //

original: phung po ma yin phung dang min //
analyzed: phung po ma yin phung dang min //
translated: It is not in the aggregates, nor is it in something different from the aggregates.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni phung po'i ngo bo ma yin pa dang / de dang 'brel ba yang ma yin la /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni phung po'i ngo bo ma yin pa dang / de dang 'brel ba yang ma yin la /
translated: The meaning of ‚ÄúIt is not in the aggregates, nor is it in something different from the aggregates‚Äù and so forth is that it is not the entity of the aggregates, nor is it related to them,

original: gzhan tha dad pa la sogs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan tha dad pa la sogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: nor is it something different from them, and so forth.

original: thams cad chos nyid gyi ngo bor 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad chos nyid gyi ngo bor 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because everything is mixed into the entity of reality.

original: gang rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni ji ltar brtags pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba rtog pa'i gzung ba de yang sngar bstan pa ltar snang tshod du med pa ma yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni ji ltar brtags pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba rtog pa'i gzung ba de yang sngar bstan pa ltar snang tshod du med pa ma yin zhes pa'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúwhatever‚Äù and so forth is that the appearance as the nature imagined, the object of imagination, is not, as was previously explained, non-existent in the way it appears.

original: yod pa'i zhes pa la sogs pas ni phan tshun ldog pa la ltos nas brtags pa'i tha dad pa yang de kho na nyid du mi 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa'i zhes pa la sogs pas ni phan tshun ldog pa la ltos nas brtags pa'i tha dad pa yang de kho na nyid du mi 'thad pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Existence‚Äù and so forth shows that the difference imagined in dependence on the mutual exclusion is not tenable in reality.

original: sgra tsam la 'jug pa ni yod pa dang med pa la sogs par bstan pa ni sgra ji bzhin gyi mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa ni mtha' gnyis su ltung bas bdag nyid kyang skye ba gzhan du bde 'gro dang thar pa las nyams par 'gyur
analyzed: sgra tsam la 'jug pa ni yod pa dang med pa la sogs par bstan pa ni sgra ji bzhin gyi mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa ni mtha' gnyis su ltung bas bdag nyid kyang skye ba gzhan du bde 'gro dang thar pa las nyams par 'gyur
translated: Engaging in mere words, teaching existence, non-existence, and so forth, engaging in the mode of apprehending the sign of the literal meaning, one falls into the two extremes, and one‚Äôs own self will also be ruined in other lives, falling from happy transmigrations and liberation.

analyzed: zhing / byis pa gzhan yang nyams par byed pas na rlag par byed ces pa'o //

analyzed: nyes pa kun las grol ba ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i dbu ma'o //

analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i don dang ldan pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs ston te /

analyzed: skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dags so zhes gsungs pa ni /

analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //

analyzed: de ltar gsungs pa'i don de skye ba la sogs pa kun rdzob tu yang med pa ri bong gi rva lta bu yin la /

analyzed: des @219b na de bzhin gshegs pa ni kun rdzob tu yang med pa nyid du ston pa yin nam /

analyzed: 'on te 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sgyu ma ston pa'i ming gi rnam grangs gcig lags /

original: de la phyogs dang po ltar na /
analyzed: de la phyogs dang po ltar na /
translated: In the first case,

analyzed: chos rnams kun dang de bzhin gshegs dang 'dra // zhes gsungs pas chos thams cad dang de'i skye ba la sogs pa yang kun rdzob tsam du yang med par 'gyur la /

analyzed: de lta na chos thams cad ces pa'i chos can dgag gzhi smos pa yang mi 'thad de /

original: de 'dra ba'i gzhi kun rdzob tu ma grub pas /
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i gzhi kun rdzob tu ma grub pas /

analyzed: de la skye ba la sogs pa bkag pa'i chos dang 'bral ba rtogs pa mi 'thad de /

original: 'chad bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'chad bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /

original: 'di rnams kyi don ni sngar bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi don ni sngar bstan zin to //

original: 'di lta ste zhes pa la sogs pa ni de'i phyir zhes pa'i don nyid rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste zhes pa la sogs pa ni de'i phyir zhes pa'i don nyid rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: As for ‚Äúit is like this,‚Äù and so forth, this is an extensive explanation of the very meaning of ‚Äúbecause.‚Äù

original: don dang mi ldan par yang mi 'chad ces ba la sogs pas de nyid sgra ji bzhin pa nyid du mi 'thad pa ston te /üîΩde'i don ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi ye shes la /
analyzed: don dang mi ldan par yang mi 'chad ces ba la sogs pas de nyid sgra ji bzhin pa nyid du mi 'thad pa ston te / de'i don ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi ye shes la /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not taught without meaning,‚Äù and so forth, demonstrates that this is not tenable as literal.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyi rnam par snang ba dang / yi ge'i rnam pa can gyi sgra yis @221b chos 'chad par snang ba kun rdzob tu ye shes kyi ngo bor gyur pa ni yod pas rnam pa thams cad du yi ge gcig kyang ma bshad ces pa la sogs pa ni dgongs pa can yin gyi /
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyi rnam par snang ba dang / yi ge'i rnam pa can gyi sgra yis @221b chos 'chad par snang ba kun rdzob tu ye shes kyi ngo bor gyur pa ni yod pas rnam pa thams cad du yi ge gcig kyang ma bshad ces pa la sogs pa ni dgongs pa can yin gyi /
translated: The meaning of this is that the enjoyment body of the TathƒÅgata, which appears in the aspect of the major and minor marks, and the teaching of the dharma by means of the sound of the letters, is conventionally the essence of wisdom. Therefore, ‚Äúnot even a single letter is taught in any way‚Äù and so forth is a case of implied meaning.

original: sgra ji bzhin par mi 'thad ces pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin par mi 'thad ces pa'o //

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba med pa la sogs par bshad pa yang /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba med pa la sogs par bshad pa yang /

original: don dang mi ldan par mi 'chad de /
analyzed: don dang mi ldan par mi 'chad de /
translated: Thus, the explanations by the TathƒÅgata of nonarising and so on are not explanations that are meaningless.

original: de ltar sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yi ge'i rnam pa can gyi sgra yis chos ston par snang ba las don ji lta bar rtogs pa'i ye shes 'char zhing de 'dra ba'i sgra don dang ldan zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yi ge'i rnam pa can gyi sgra yis chos ston par snang ba las don ji lta bar rtogs pa'i ye shes 'char zhing de 'dra ba'i sgra don dang ldan zhes pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas on the tenth level appear to teach the dharma by means of sounds that are in the form of letters, and from that arises the gnosis that realizes the meaning just as it is.

original: yang byang chub sems dpa' dang byis pa'i skye bo la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa gnas ma gyur pa rnams ni de 'dra ba'i sgra ru snang ba la brten nas de dang 'dres pa don spyi'i rnam par snang ba byung ba na /
analyzed: yang byang chub sems dpa' dang byis pa'i skye bo la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa gnas ma gyur pa rnams ni de 'dra ba'i sgra ru snang ba la brten nas de dang 'dres pa don spyi'i rnam par snang ba byung ba na /
translated: Moreover, bodhisattvas and childish beings, whose conceptual thoughts have not been transformed, on the basis of the appearance of such sounds, give rise to the appearance of a generic image that is mixed with those sounds.

original: de nyid rtogs bya'i don gyi rang gi mtshan nyid du zhen nas de la 'jug cing sgro 'dogs gcod pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid rtogs bya'i don gyi rang gi mtshan nyid du zhen nas de la 'jug cing sgro 'dogs gcod pa ste /

original: de yang sgra'i dngos kyi don mi bden kyang zhen par byas pa'i don bden pas don dang ldan par 'gyur gyi mi ldan par mi 'chad ces pa'o //
analyzed: de yang sgra'i dngos kyi don mi bden kyang zhen par byas pa'i don bden pas don dang ldan par 'gyur gyi mi ldan par mi 'chad ces pa'o //
translated: Although the actual meaning of the word is not true, since the meaning that is taken to be true is endowed with meaning, it is not explained as being devoid of meaning.

original: rnam par rtog pa bzung zhes pa ni rtog pa'i snang ba la don nyid du bdag gir byas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bzung zhes pa ni rtog pa'i snang ba la don nyid du bdag gir byas pa'o //

original: de 'dra ba'i chos bstan pa kun rdzob pa de yang med na ni bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i chos bstan pa kun rdzob pa de yang med na ni bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur te /
translated: If such a teaching of the Dharma, which is conventional, did not exist, the teaching would be destroyed.

original: bstan pa zhig na ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam med pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa med par 'gyur la /
analyzed: bstan pa zhig na ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam med pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa med par 'gyur la /
translated: If the teaching were destroyed, there would be no path of definite emergence, and thus there would be no Buddha, and so on.

original: de dag med na yang su la ci zhig bshad de bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur zhes pa'o //üîΩtshig gi tshul 'di ni 'jig rten na bya med na sgo nga mi 'byung la /
analyzed: de dag med na yang su la ci zhig bshad de bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur zhes pa'o // tshig gi tshul 'di ni 'jig rten na bya med na sgo nga mi 'byung la /
translated: If they did not exist, then to whom and what would be taught? The teaching would be destroyed.üîΩThis way of speaking is similar to the worldly saying, ‚ÄúIf there is no bird, there is no egg.

original: sgo nga med par yang bya mi 'byung ngo zhes pa dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: sgo nga med par yang bya mi 'byung ngo zhes pa dang mtshungs so //
translated: If there is no egg, there is no bird.‚Äù

original: des na zhes pa la sogs pas nye bar gdams pa nyid ston te /
analyzed: des na zhes pa la sogs pas nye bar gdams pa nyid ston te /
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù and so on teach the very instruction.

original: kun rdzob tsam du de 'dra ba'i bshad pa'i tshul 'thad cing /
analyzed: kun rdzob tsam du de 'dra ba'i bshad pa'i tshul 'thad cing /
translated: Such an explanation is tenable merely conventionally.

original: de kho na nyid du phyi rol la ma shes ba'i ngo bor gyur pa mi 'thad cing /
analyzed: de kho na nyid du phyi rol la ma shes ba'i ngo bor gyur pa mi 'thad cing /
translated: But it is not tenable in terms of reality that the external world is the nature of what is not known.

original: gzhan yang don dang 'dres pa'i brjod pa mi 'thad pas bshad pa brjod pa'i sgra la phyin ci log tu mngon par ma chags bar bya zhing /
analyzed: gzhan yang don dang 'dres pa'i brjod pa mi 'thad pas bshad pa brjod pa'i sgra la phyin ci log tu mngon par ma chags bar bya zhing /
translated: Moreover, since it is not tenable that expressions are mixed with objects, one should not be attached to the sounds of the expressions that are explained.

original: de'i rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya zhes pa'o //
translated: One should know their nature just as it is.

original: blo gros chen po bshad pa'i brjod pa zhes pa la sogs pas ni khyad par du sprul pa'i sku yis ngo bo nyid med pa dang / phung po la sogs gang zag dang // yi ge gcig kyang ma bshad ces brjod pa la sogs @222a * //
analyzed: blo gros chen po bshad pa'i brjod pa zhes pa la sogs pas ni khyad par du sprul pa'i sku yis ngo bo nyid med pa dang / phung po la sogs gang zag dang // yi ge gcig kyang ma bshad ces brjod pa la sogs @222a * //
translated: ‚ÄúMahƒÅmati, the expressions of explanation‚Äù and so on indicate that in particular the nirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya does not explain the lack of nature, the person of the aggregates, and so on, and not even a single syllable.

original: pa ni / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin du zhugs pas 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: pa ni / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin du zhugs pas 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: This is said to be a mistake because it is in accordance with the thoughts of sentient beings.

original: de'i don ni 'ga' zhig thog ma med pa nas dngos por zhen pas de dag gi skrag pa spang ba'i don du phung po la sogs pa yod par brjod cing /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'ga' zhig thog ma med pa nas dngos por zhen pas de dag gi skrag pa spang ba'i don du phung po la sogs pa yod par brjod cing /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: For the sake of eliminating the fears of some who are attached to things from beginningless time, it is said that the aggregates and so on exist.

original: yang dngos por zhen pa spangs pa'am ngo bo nyid med pa la sogs par bstan pas 'dul bar gyur pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig gi don du ngo bo nyid med pa la sogs par brjod la /
analyzed: yang dngos por zhen pa spangs pa'am ngo bo nyid med pa la sogs par bstan pas 'dul bar gyur pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig gi don du ngo bo nyid med pa la sogs par brjod la /
translated: For the sake of some individuals who are to be guided by the teachings on the absence of attachment to things or the lack of intrinsic existence and so on, it is said that there is no intrinsic existence and so on.

original: bshad pa'i sgra la mngon par zhen pa spang pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang ma bshad ces gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa'i sgra la mngon par zhen pa spang pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang ma bshad ces gsungs pa ste /
translated: In order to eliminate attachment to the sound of the explanations, not a single syllable is explained.

original: de'i phyir de dag la sgra ji bzhin gyi don du zhen pa ni 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag la sgra ji bzhin gyi don du zhen pa ni 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, attachment to the literal meaning is a mistake.

original: nga dang zhes pa la sogs pas don de nyid rgyas par 'chad de /
analyzed: nga dang zhes pa la sogs pas don de nyid rgyas par 'chad de /
translated: The meaning of that is explained extensively by ‚ÄúI‚Äù and so on.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa bzlog ces pa ni snga ma ltar yi ge'i rnam pa can gyi sgra la mngon par zhen pa'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir chos sna tshogs brjod par bya'o //

translated: The phrase the mental consciousness is reversed means that in order to reverse the mental consciousness that is conceptual thought and so on, which is fixated on the sound that is the aspect of letters, as above, one should express the various Dharmas.

original: chos thams cad la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis kyi rnam par snang zhing sgro 'dogs pa med cing /
analyzed: chos thams cad la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis kyi rnam par snang zhing sgro 'dogs pa med cing /
translated: All Dharmas appear as the duality of apprehendeds and apprehenders, but they are not so imputed.

original: rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du chud pas rnam par rtog pa mang po log pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du chud pas rnam par rtog pa mang po log pa ste /
translated: By understanding that they are merely one's own mind appearing, many conceptual thoughts are reversed.

analyzed: khyad par dus brgyad pa yan chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis so so rang gis rig par bya ba /
translated: In particular, the meaning that is to be realized by the bodhisattvas of the eighth bhumi and above, which is to be personally experienced,

analyzed: de 'dra ba'i rnam pa can gyi gsung yang med la de ltar snang ba yang rtogs bya'i don dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes de 'dra ba bzlog pa'i don du /

analyzed: nga yis yi ge gcig kyang ma bshad ces gsungs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that I have not explained a single syllable.

original: yang na de 'dra ba'i sgra la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par shes pa rnams gnas gyur pa'i ye shes thob pa'i gegs yin pas de 'dra ba bzlog pa'i don du bstan gyi zhes pa la sogs pa sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na de 'dra ba'i sgra la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par shes pa rnams gnas gyur pa'i ye shes thob pa'i gegs yin pas de 'dra ba bzlog pa'i don du bstan gyi zhes pa la sogs pa sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Or else, one should apply in order to reverse such an appearance and so forth, because clinging to such a sound is an obstacle to attaining the wisdom of the transformation of consciousnesses.

analyzed: brjod pa gzhan yang sngar bstan pa ltar gdul bya'i bsam pa la ltos te brjod pa'o //
translated: Moreover, as previously explained, [the teaching] depends on the thoughts of the disciples.

original: blo gros chen po zhes pa la sogs pas de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar gdams pa'o //
analyzed: blo gros chen po zhes pa la sogs pas de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar gdams pa'o //
translated: With MahƒÅmati, and so forth, [the Buddha] thus instructs the bodhisattvas.

original: don la brtan par bya'i yi ge la brtan par mi bya'o zhes pa ni don gang la dgongs te bshad ba'i dgongs don rigs pas 'thad pa'i don nyid la yid ches par bya'i /
analyzed: don la brtan par bya'i yi ge la brtan par mi bya'o zhes pa ni don gang la dgongs te bshad ba'i dgongs don rigs pas 'thad pa'i don nyid la yid ches par bya'i /
translated: The meaning is to be relied on, not the words.

original: yi ge'i rnam pa can gyi @222b sgra yis dngos su brjod pa'i don la yid ches par mi bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge'i rnam pa can gyi @222b sgra yis dngos su brjod pa'i don la yid ches par mi bya zhes pa'o //
translated: This means that one should rely on the meaning of the intended explanation, which is established by reasoning, and not on the meaning expressed directly by the words, which are in the form of letters.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: It is as stated in the following:

original: sgra de la ni gang chags pa /
analyzed: sgra de la ni gang chags pa /
translated: Those who are attached to the words

original: dgongs te bshad pa mi shes so //
analyzed: dgongs te bshad pa mi shes so //
translated: Do not know the intended meaning.

original: zhes ba la sogs pa sngar bstan no //
analyzed: zhes ba la sogs pa sngar bstan no //

original: de ltar sgra ji bzhin gyi don du mngon bar zhen pa ni sgro 'dogs dang skur 'debs kyi mtha' gnyis kyi lta bar lhung bas bdag nyid kyang mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i dbu ma'i don gyi rtogs pa las nyams par byed cing /
analyzed: de ltar sgra ji bzhin gyi don du mngon bar zhen pa ni sgro 'dogs dang skur 'debs kyi mtha' gnyis kyi lta bar lhung bas bdag nyid kyang mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i dbu ma'i don gyi rtogs pa las nyams par byed cing /
translated: Thus, clinging to the meaning of the words as they stand is a view that falls into the extremes of superimposition and denial. Therefore, one will not only fail to realize the meaning of the middle way, which is free from the two extremes, but

analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang de 'dra ba khong du chud par mi byed do //

original: tshig dang nges pa'i sgra ni sngar bshad pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig gi rnam grangs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / bde bar gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tshig dang nges pa'i sgra ni sngar bshad pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig gi rnam grangs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / bde bar gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: gzhan ni shes par zad do //

translated: One's own position is the position of the view of denial, which is proclaimed by taking non-arising, etc. to be literally true, and the position of the view of superimposition.

original: de ste zhes pa la sogs pas de las bzlog pa'i phan yon ston te /
analyzed: de ste zhes pa la sogs pas de las bzlog pa'i phan yon ston te /
translated: The benefits of the opposite of that are taught by If one does not understand, etc.

analyzed: de 'dra ba'i theg pa chen po la brten cing gnas na /

analyzed: de las nges par legs pa'i thabs rnams 'byung bas de 'dra ba'i 'bras bu rgyun ma chad par 'byung zhes pa'o //

analyzed: yongs su bzung bas ni de las mi nyams pa'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad bzung ba ni ngan 'gro dang srid pa'i sdug bsngal las skyob cing /
translated: Taking up all sentient beings is protecting them from the sufferings of bad rebirth and cyclic existence,

analyzed: de 'dra ba'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'o //
translated: and causing them to attain such a state.

original: de ltar thob pas kyang dam pa'i chos rgyun mi 'chad pas chos yongs su bzung ba yin no zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩji ltar bya las sgo ngar 'gyur zhing /

analyzed: skye gnas kyi bye brag ni 'gro ba la phan par 'gyur ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs par 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: gzugs dang cha byad ces pa la gzugs ni 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs so //

analyzed: cha byad ni gdul bya ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs kyi cha byad sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: The aspect is the various aspects of enumeration that tame disciples in whatever way is necessary.

original: sems can gyi cha byad rtogs zhes 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya ste /üîΩgang gis 'dul @223a * //
analyzed: sems can gyi cha byad rtogs zhes 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya ste / gang gis 'dul @223a * //

analyzed: bar 'gyur ba'i cha byad du ston pa'i mkhyen pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of displaying the aspects by which they are tamed.

analyzed: de bzhin nyid du chos ston zhes pa ni gdul bya'i khams dang / dbang po'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du'o //

analyzed: de la gang dag theg pa chen po'i rigs can dbang po rnon po rnams la ni /
